basics.name: Mechanical Engineering Intern
basics.label: Mechanical Engineer
basics.summary: Mechanical Engineer Professional offering 25 years of progressive experience within a manufacturing setting. Experienced project manager that negotiates prices for project, created and implemented preventive/corrective maintenance strategies and completed projects before deadline and under budget. Proficient in SolidWorks, Auto-Cad, Failure analysis, Microsoft Office, military industrial settings, and troubleshooting mechanical/electrical systems.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Updated Piping and instrumentation drawings in Auto-Cad. Performed failure analysis on process equipment and implemented new maintenance schedules. Worked on several projects including HVAC zone installation, water reduction projects, and fire suppression system for oil recovery unit.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Designed diesel fuel tanks for 400 and 750 kW generators on Auto-Cad using Ul-142 standards. Assisted in new design of the generator conversion from diesel fuel into natural gas. Worked as a Project Manager for re-enforcing mobile generator trailers. Composed operating procedures for diesel generators.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for the maintenance and calibration of process control and laboratory equipment. Evaluated and installed engineering upgrades for research, design, and prototype upgrades. Implemented new Data Acquisition system including installing and programming 32 new Honeywell chart recorders. Fixed and calibrated oxygen sensor for updraft of Thermal Oxidizing stack which was said to be unrepairable. Coordinated contractors, architects and other project team members to deliver high quality projects within specified time frames.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Installed electrical/mechanical modifications on multi-million dollar LRV's. Created critical spare parts lists for modifications to LRV's. Purchased and organized materials for LRV's. Responsible for scheduling trains for modification upgrades and testing.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Installed and wired electronics/electrical components on 85 and 65 foot yachts. Built engine rooms from the ground up dealing with carpentry, electrical, mechanical, and fiberglass work.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Operated and maintained rotational molding machine. Trained personnel on all 5 stations and helped make operation procedures for machines.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for all coordination and building of treatment plants. Finished projects prior to deadline and under budget. Initiated and wrote all corrective/preventive maintenance schedules for treatment sites. Wired and installed new wastewater system of BC ferries.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Repaired all electrical/electronic systems onboard navy ships. Mentored/trained junior personnel. Maintained Reverse Osmosis distillation and Electro Catalytic sewer treatment plants. Handled preventive and corrective maintenance on IPC/PLC electronic switchboards, HVAC, Fire suppression, liquid level management systems and all domestic equipment.
